document.full_text: chancellor angela merkel promised on tuesday an early decision on the fate of germany's nuclear power stations and refused to say whether seven reactors shut after japan's crisis would ever reopen.
document.title: german nuclear plants need rapid decisions: merkel
lines_and_colors: chancellor angela merkel promised on tuesday an early decision on the fate of germany's nuclear power stations and refused to say whether seven reactors shut after japan's crisis would ever reopen.
